methods.name: _performValidate
methods.description: Executes validate function. If a validate promise is pending, value is queued.

methods.name: _setValidateResults

params.name: isValid
params.description: Did the rule validate or not.

methods.description: Updates component state and performs validate if there is a queued value.

validate.description: How to validate the data, returns true if data is valid

onValidChange.description: Function called when validation state changes
